creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Marks, and Seals

URQ: [By the window at dawn, my white hair battles the west wind. / As I smile, the blue clouds are gone like the past. / Only the blue mountains are my bosom friends, / which I meet most often in paintings.]
markings: Marks on top of scroll, in pen: [No. 1975 Hankō]; URQ: [Shuku Shiu in]; [Shuku in]
medium: Hanging scroll, ink and light color on paper
signed: URQ: [Emulating the brushwork of Qing Chinese painters, Hankō]
title: Landscape after a Qing Chinese Work
